name: moddable-boilerplate
description: Yet another moddableSDK project boilerplate with typescript, eslint and prettier

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp manifest.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig
scripts.deploy:linux: npm run clean && tsc && cp manifest.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -d -m -p lin
scripts.deploy:m5stack: npm run clean && tsc && cp manifest.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -d -m -p esp32/m5stack
